trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGYOK6WORLARSECHO_00870_TAHRAFAHR_000_000<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Good evening)) ((Good morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good afternoon)) ((Good evening)) /var>)) /var> and welcome to Worlar's Echo, home of the Yok Huy. I can scarcely remember the last time this village received visitors other than the occasional Pelupelu merchant.
TEXT_REGYOK6WORLARSECHO_00870_TAHRAFAHR_000_001<tab>With Valigarmanda on the loose, all I ask is that you let me speak of this land, that we might live on in your memory.

TEXT_REGYOK6WORLARSECHO_00870_TAHRAFAHR_000_002<tab>Suffice it to say you have well and truly left your mark on our history. Thanks to you, our memory will live on for some time yet. In return, might I tell you of our culture?

TEXT_REGYOK6WORLARSECHO_00870_TAHRAFAHR_000_003<tab>The hero who slew Valigarmanda has been crowned Dawnservant, has she? A most joyous moment in history. Indeed, I may even mark the event on my gravestone.

TEXT_REGYOK6WORLARSECHO_00870_TAHRAFAHR_000_010<tab>Me? Well, most days I make sure everyone in the village gets enough to eat. I have also been charged with welcoming outsiders, as there are scant few among us confident in their command of the common tongue.
TEXT_REGYOK6WORLARSECHO_00870_TAHRAFAHR_000_011<tab>I do not think myself especially eloquent compared to my neighbors here, but please do forgive us if we mispronounce a word or two.

TEXT_REGYOK6WORLARSECHO_00870_TAHRAFAHR_000_012<tab>Even should the Skyruin sear our flesh and bones, I am content knowing I will live on in your memory. You must flee from here before you join us in our fate!

TEXT_REGYOK6WORLARSECHO_00870_TAHRAFAHR_000_020<tab>Worlar's Echo: where the clattering of stone upon stone gave rise to a great mountain. It is where the Yok Huy began, and it is where we will one day end.

TEXT_REGYOK6WORLARSECHO_00870_TAHRAFAHR_000_021<tab>Isolated as we are from the rest of Tural, ours is a homogenous community. We seek only to live in peace with our ancestors and maintain the ancient stonework they've entrusted to us.
